website_summaries.verdict: Compatible with all DEWALT 40-volt max tools for all your needs.
pros: Features a 4-LED gauge that allows you to see the progress of your charge
This 40-volt battery has virtually no self-discharge for maximum productivity
Compatible with most DEWALT tools and power equipment
cons: Might need a full charge, dependent on tool

customer_reviews.title: The Details
customer_reviews.text: Exact size and fit of other DeWalt 40 volt batteries. This 7.5 Ah lasts pretty close to twice the continual run of the 4 Ah that came with both the weed eater and blower I purchased = Those last continually for right at 15 minutes. Of course this one takes much longer to charge. I fully charges it when received = ran it 29 min = it stopped = took 2 hr 40 min to fully recharge. THE 4 Ah weighs 3 lb 3 oz - THIS 7.5 weights exactly one lb more = weighting 4 lb 3 oz. That may be a noticeable difference in weight for some
customer_reviews.author: majormusiclover

customer_reviews.title: Defective battery.
customer_reviews.text: Battery was defective and would not charge at all. The charger blinked red rapidly which indicates a bad battery. Thankfully my current battery still charges and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Zenobi

customer_reviews.title: These batteries are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 1 of these with a new 40v Trimmer, Blower, and Hedger. I love these so much. One battery with a full charge tends to last around 1 hour with the Trimmer. If it is lasting for less it is because of your use or you are on the Hi setting on the trimmer. I love how easy it is to see the level of charge by using the indicator on the rear. If you are a power user I recommend at least 3 batteries per tool so that you have plenty of batteries to last for your entire project as it takes about 1.5 hours to fully charge.
customer_reviews.author: Shannyv

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two batteries. One charged OK and works fine. The other, however, would not charge new out of box. Bad experience attempting to return the defective battery with the third party seller. Had to involve Amazon support twice to get full refund. Amazon was good to deal with as intermediary.... not so with the third party seller.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SERVICE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this spare battery for my DeWalt String Trimmer on Saturday, received it on Monday, and returned it on Tuesday after finding that it was defective (it would not charge). I received a replacement on Thursday which charged up fine. This is one of the reasons that Amazon is my first option when I am in the market for.... well..... just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Hicova

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Extra Battery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a year ago for our leaf blower. It performs like the one that came with the blower. I wish it held a charge a little longer, but it is nice to have one ready as a backup if you have a big job. It is still fully charging a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Onamission

customer_reviews.title: Back up battery is good to have
customer_reviews.text: Don’t ask the manufacturer about battery problems they want you to buy new batteries when all you need to do is some adjusting to the charger. But this battery is a good backup.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: It's a expensive battery and it lasts 45 minutes in my mower.
customer_reviews.text: It's a necessity to have this extra battery to cut my yard and it's not that big of a yard, it also costs almost the same price as the lawnmower I use it in.
customer_reviews.author: Allen W. Bauck

customer_reviews.title: Great Batteries
customer_reviews.text: I get about 1 full hour of use with a trimmer and mower. I use the trimmer on low, trim the yard, then mow, then trim on High the edges. So it has plenty of juice for mowing and trimming a typical residential house.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: do not last 1 year
customer_reviews.text: bought a spare for my 93 year old dad and both batteries went out within a year ,he cant afford to spend a $132.00 on a battery so he is dragging a cord around again. I would think Dewalt would have a better product. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: chip keeney

customer_reviews.title: Barely used....Now it will not hold a charge!
customer_reviews.text: I have barely used this battery. It was lightly used, yet less than 12 months later it will not hold a charge. That’s a lot of money wasted for the amount of use I got out of it. I have inquired about there return policy. An update to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Congdon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't let the chainsaw bog dow on larger cuts.
customer_reviews.text: The battery had more than adequate power for my chainsaw still had 4 bars after 25 minutes of cutting a small tree and several large branches. Goal is to use it for a blower when I get one.
customer_reviews.author: Frank F. Long

customer_reviews.title: Goo so far
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. Battery a bit expensive but if it last worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Compliment to Dewalt Blower
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast shipping, great price. Lasts a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Littleracecars

customer_reviews.title: Needed A backup!
customer_reviews.text: this battery fits quite a few of my husbands power tools plus his blower!!
customer_reviews.author: karen l peterson

customer_reviews.title: so far the battery pack for the Dewalt leaf blower ...
customer_reviews.text: so far the battery pack for the Dewalt leaf blower have met my expectations though I have only used them but for a short time.They are not overly heavy and is a time saver not having to hook up an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dillon

customer_reviews.title: What A Piece of Crap
customer_reviews.text: After 15 months, this nearly $200.00 battery is good only as a paperweight. Very disappointing. Stick with gas powered chain saw.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Cumbee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great holds charge. Was able to cut all my hedges in one charge.
customer_reviews.author: leurinimj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I can get 40 to 45 minutes of cutting time. Only slightly heavier than the 4AH pack.
customer_reviews.author: RonZ

customer_reviews.title: Good battery
customer_reviews.text: Works great but a bit pricier than I though it should be
customer_reviews.author: Ben Grzejka

customer_reviews.title: great battery
customer_reviews.text: great battery, needed a third battery for my blower and weed eater, with {3] I never run out of battery life trim and blow entire yard, drive and street.
customer_reviews.author: James Parker

customer_reviews.title: It Charged Only Once
customer_reviews.text: My previous battery worked just 5 charges and this one only once. Do not buy this product. It is waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mehran Viseh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price saving over other sources and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Provides the extra time when cutting wood over the 6.0 Ah battery. Well worth the cost. Fantastic price saving over other sources and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: H. Frieda

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Paid 180 dollars. Non returnable and money non refundable
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy1947

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Battery did not work. After charging for days, could not get it to start my lawn mowr
customer_reviews.author: Ebi

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived promptly and intact. It was expensive but necessary.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sansone

customer_reviews.title: Support your Veterans!
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Quick shipping. Happy to purchase from a Veteran owned business! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: On Point
customer_reviews.text: As expected performance from a Dewalt battery. Came from CPO Outlets I've purchased from them before, good people and price.
customer_reviews.author: Travisbgood

customer_reviews.title: You can never go wrong with quality merchandise!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have given this battery a full charge and it is already in full service. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Golf Bob

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power!!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery works great and has plenty of power with the Dewalt Chainsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wathen

customer_reviews.title: I have not used the battery yet
customer_reviews.text: I do like the weight of the battery but I didn’t like how quick it arrive .
customer_reviews.author: Back up plan

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you own Dewalt 40v tools!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you own the Dewalt lawn mower!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting. Quick charging. Would have given a 5 star, but it’s a little heavy. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Head

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the money. If i need another would buy again
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery arrived in good condition - was able to quickly charge and use right away.
customer_reviews.author: phototaker

customer_reviews.title: Reilable , and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Very good battery holds well and it’s worh the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yowsah
customer_reviews.text: This is the unit DeWalt should supply with their blower nthe first place.
customer_reviews.author: Les Prangley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: lasted about 8 month! too expensive to last so little
customer_reviews.author: Hussein

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 40V Dewalt Leaf Blower which is a fantastic tool. Power is exceptional and charge lasts a ...
customer_reviews.text: Spare for my 40V Dewalt Leaf Blower which is a fantastic tool. Power is exceptional and charge lasts a long time (I have a big area to clear and 2 batteries let me finish the entire area).
customer_reviews.author: Robert O Cone III

customer_reviews.title: 5 hours of bucking with saw
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 ah to use while this is charging but got a lot more time out of this. I was bucking some pretty hefty oak, so I would def recommend the higher end battery and the chainsaw the it goes to.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D. Cappella

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: although it shows fully charged it will NOT propel tools. Please replace or refund. B.
customer_reviews.author: b g

product_meta.title: DEWALT 40V MAX Lithium Battery, 4-Ah (DCB404)
product_meta.description: Style:4.0AhThe DEWALT DCB404 40V Battery Pack, 4AH features a 4-LED fuel gauge that allows for immediate feedback on state of charge. This battery has no memory and virtually no self-discharge for maximum productivity and less downtime when operating all of your outdoor and DIY tools. Compatible with all DEWALT 40V MAX tools and outdoor power equipment.
feature_bullets: 4AH features a 4-LED fuel gauge that allows you to see the state of charge
No memory and virtually no self-discharge for maximum productivity
Compatible with all DEWALT 40V MAX tools and outdoor power equipment
*Maximum initial battery voltage (measured without a workload) is 40 volts. Nominal voltage is 36

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars205 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
